name: Golden Whip to Avatar Mountain
description: Head out on this 6.3-km point-to-point trail near Zhangjiajie Shi, Hunan. Generally considered a challenging route, it takes an average of 2 h 18 min to complete. This is a very popular area for hiking, so you'll likely encounter other people while exploring. The best times to visit this trail are April through October.
